author: Kobe Bryant
text: The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.

author: Einstein
text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

author: Covenant
text: I'm still building, even when it hurts.

author: Jay Shetty
text: Your new life will cost you your old one.

author: Covenant
text: We either win or i win. Failure is not an option for me.
